data.lyric:
[ti:Nightmare (Explicit)]
[ar:Halsey]
[al:Nightmare (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Nightmare (Explicit) - Halsey
[00:00.70]Lyrics by：Ashley Frangipane/Benjamin Levin/Magnus August Høiberg/Nathan Perez
[00:01.41]Composed by：Ashley Frangipane/Benjamin Levin/Magnus August Høiberg/Nathan Perez
[00:02.12]Now I lay me down to sleep
[00:04.48]I pray the Lord my soul to keep
[00:07.21]If I shall die before I wake
[00:09.95]I pray the Lord my soul to take
[00:13.50]I I keep a record of the wreckage of my life
[00:17.88]I gotta recognize the weapon in my mind
[00:21.13]They talk s**t but I love it every time
[00:24.53]And I realize
[00:27.05]I've tasted blood and it is sweet
[00:30.31]I've had the rug pulled beneath my feet
[00:33.57]I've trusted lies and trusted men
[00:36.92]Broke down and put myself back together again
[00:40.08]Stared in the mirror and punched it to shatters
[00:42.92]Collected the pieces and picked out a dagger
[00:46.33]I've pinched my skin in between my two fingers
[00:49.56]And wished I could cut some parts off with some scissors
[00:52.54]"Come on little lady give us a smile"
[00:55.90]No I ain't got nothin' to smile about
[00:58.95]I got no one to smile for I waited a while for
[01:02.60]A moment to say I don't owe you a godd**n thing
[01:06.25]I I keep a record of the wreckage of my life
[01:10.47]I gotta recognize the weapon in my mind
[01:13.70]They talk s**t but I love it every time
[01:17.10]And I realize
[01:19.18]I'm no sweet dream but I'm a hell of a night
[01:25.44]That I'm no sweet dream but I'm a hell of a night
[01:32.81]No I won't smile but I'll show you my teeth
[01:35.92]And I'ma let you speak if you just let me breathe
[01:39.40]I've been polite but won't be caught dead
[01:42.49]Lettin' a man tell me what I should do in my bed
[01:45.88]Keep my exes in check in my basement
[01:48.71]'Cause kindness is weakness or worse your complacent
[01:52.15]I could play nice or I could be a bully
[01:55.21]I'm tired and angry but somebody should be
[01:58.63]"Come on little lady give us a smile"
[02:01.63]No I ain't got nothin' to smile about
[02:04.69]I got no one to smile for I waited a while for
[02:08.26]A moment to say I don't owe you a godd**n thing
[02:12.11]I I keep a record of the wreckage of my life
[02:16.16]I gotta recognize the weapon in my mind
[02:19.46]They talk s**t but I love it every time
[02:22.96]And I realize
[02:25.04]I I keep a record of the wreckage of my life
[02:29.36]I gotta recognize the weapon in my mind
[02:32.62]They talk s**t but I love it every time
[02:36.01]And I realize
[02:37.85]Someone like me can be a real nightmare completely aware
[02:44.50]But I'd rather be a real nightmare than I die unaware yeah
[02:51.32]Someone like me can be a real nightmare completely aware
[02:57.44]But I'm glad to be a real nightmare so save me your prayers
[03:04.54]I I keep a record of the wreckage of my life
[03:08.78]I gotta recognize the weapon in my mind
[03:12.07]They talk s**t but I love it every time
[03:15.40]And I realize
[03:17.63]I I keep a record of the wreckage of my life
[03:21.96]I gotta recognize the weapon in my mind
[03:25.25]They talk s**t but I love it every time
[03:28.65]And I realize
[03:30.42]I'm no sweet dream but I'm a hell of a night
[03:36.98]That I'm no sweet dream but I'm a hell of a night
data.trans:
[ti:Nightmare (Explicit)]
[ar:Halsey]
[al:Nightmare (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.70]//
[00:01.41]//
[00:02.12]我现在躺下睡觉
[00:04.48]我祈求上帝 让我灵魂不灭
[00:07.21]如果我就这样一睡不醒
[00:09.95]我会祈求上帝 带走我的灵魂
[00:13.50]我把以前受过的伤一一记在心里
[00:17.88]我知道 歌声就是我的利器
[00:21.13]大家对我说三道四 但我乐意听这些话
[00:24.53]我明白了
[00:27.05]我尝过血的味道 是甜的
[00:30.31]我已经被逼到没有退路
[00:33.57]我相信了谎言 相信了男人
[00:36.92]心碎过 又重新振作起来
[00:40.08]盯着镜子 一拳把它打碎
[00:42.92]把碎片收拾好 挑出一块尖锐的
[00:46.33]在身上各个地方动刀子剪子
[00:49.56]只为拥有美丽的外表
[00:52.54]来 小妞 给我们笑一个
[00:55.90]不 我实在笑不出来
[00:58.95]我不知道笑给谁看 我静待时机
[01:02.60]希望有一天可以大声地说 我又不欠你什么
[01:06.25]我把以前受过的伤一一记在心里
[01:10.47]我知道 歌声就是我的利器
[01:13.70]大家对我说三道四 但我乐意听这些话
[01:17.10]我明白了
[01:19.18]我不是什么梦中情人 我只会让你做噩梦
[01:25.44]我不是什么梦中情人 我只会让你做噩梦
[01:32.81]不 我不会对你笑 我会勇敢地反击
[01:35.92]只要我得以喘息 我迟早会让你跪地求饶
[01:39.40]我向来以礼待人 但绝不会坐以待毙
[01:42.49]不会让那些男人来教我男欢女爱之事
[01:45.88]把我的前任们全部抓来关进地下室
[01:48.71]对敌人善良就是对自己残忍 你太自负了
[01:52.15]我可以装乖 也可以很霸道
[01:55.21]我又累又气 但这应该是他们的下场
[01:58.63]来 小妞 给我们笑一个
[02:01.63]不 我实在笑不出来
[02:04.69]我不知道笑给谁看 我静待时机
[02:08.26]希望有一天可以大声地说 我又不欠你什么
[02:12.11]我把以前受过的伤一一记在心里
[02:16.16]我知道 歌声就是我的利器
[02:19.46]大家对我说三道四 但我乐意听这些话
[02:22.96]我明白了
[02:25.04]我把以前受过的伤一一记在心里
[02:29.36]我知道 歌声就是我的利器
[02:32.62]大家对我说三道四 但我乐意听这些话
[02:36.01]我明白了
[02:37.85]像我这样的人绝对是一场噩梦 我很清楚
[02:44.50]但我宁愿成为噩梦 也不想不明不白地死去
[02:51.32]像我这样的人绝对是一场噩梦 我很清楚
[02:57.44]但我喜欢成为噩梦 所以不用为我祈祷
[03:04.54]我把以前受过的伤一一记在心里
[03:08.78]我知道 歌声就是我的利器
[03:12.07]大家对我说三道四 但我乐意听这些话
[03:15.40]我明白了
[03:17.63]我把以前受过的伤一一记在心里
[03:21.96]我知道 歌声就是我的利器
[03:25.25]大家对我说三道四 但我乐意听这些话
[03:28.65]我明白了
[03:30.42]我不是什么梦中情人 我只会让你做噩梦
[03:36.98]我不是什么梦中情人 我只会让你做噩梦
